q: on 02/04/2011 6:07:03 AM PST Donald Rumsfeld has more integrity, honesty and patriotism in his pinky toenail than 10 John McCain 's. " ( Allen Iverson ) will not be able to return to professional basketball for some six to eight weeks or more this season," James Andrews said in a statement sent out by Allen Iverson 's manager, Gary Moore . At this point, it is certainly more important to get his calf healed and asymptomatic than it is to try to play with continued pain. We anticipate a full recovery and certainly anticipate him being able to resume a normal basketball career. We liked a comment an ESPN.com reader named Felix Jones wrote about the issue: The obvious response[ especially as a Tigers fan] would be to say,' I hope Mark Buehrle gets hurt!,' but I truly don't. Mr. Mark Buehrle , I hope you go through the entire season- the rest of your career, as well- without any significant injuries. I just hope you suck.
